system.description:
Prerequisites

STR 13, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Any)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.aFfVrifmKKT9Rpzw]{Two-Weapon Melee Fighting}

Benefits

A character may wield a weapon they are proficient with in their primary hand and a small or smaller weapon in their off hand. When wielding two weapons in this manner, the primary weapon has a +2 attack bonus.

Special

The benefits of the Two Weapons Melee Fighting Feat apply when using this feat. Weapons that are considered small for the user when using are considered small for this feat.
